Public Structure OracleTimeSpan Implements IComparable, INullable
public value class OracleTimeSpan : IComparable, System::Data::SqlTypes::INullable

summary.span: 表示时间间隔，并且对应于 Oracle 9i 数据类型。

span.span: Represents a time interval and corresponds to the Oracle 9i data type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Oracle`INTERVAL DAY TO SECOND`数据类型 (Oracle 9i 或更高版本) 包含的时间单位为天、 小时、 分钟和秒为单位的时间间隔，并且具有 11 个字节的固定的大小。The Oracle `INTERVAL DAY TO SECOND` data type (Oracle 9i or later) contains an interval of time in days, hours, minutes, and seconds, and has a fixed size of 11 bytes. 若要获取对象，请调用方法。To obtain an object, call the method.

summary.span: 表示 结构的最大有效日期值。

span.span: Represents the maximum valid date value for an structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值为 10675199.02:48:05.4775807。The value is 10675199.02:48:05.4775807. 若要获取的值比大，使用 Oracle 选择 TO_CHAR 语句。To obtain a value greater than , use the Oracle SELECT TO_CHAR statement. 有关支持的 Oracle 9i 范围的详细信息`INTERVAL DAY TO SECOND`数据类型，请参阅 Oracle 文档。For more information about the ranges supported by the Oracle 9i `INTERVAL DAY TO SECOND` data type, see your Oracle documentation.
